articles.title: Can particles really be in two places at the same time?
articles.description: When talking about quantum physics, people will often nonchalantly say that particles can be in two places at once. Physicist Sabine Hossenfelder explores what is actually going on

articles.title: Men may eat more in summer because sunlight makes them hungrier
articles.description: Sunlight hitting the skin seems to boost secretion of an appetite-boosting hormone in men, causing them to eat more in summer – but women are immune

articles.title: Gel-coated battery could stop mobile phones catching fire or exploding
